quotes: In 2015, the United Nations identified 680 distinct mechanisms related to digital cooperation,2 and the number has since risen to over a thousand.3
While digital technologies have been developing for many years, in the last decade their cumulative impacts have become so deep, wide-ranging and fast-changing as to herald the dawn of a new age.
If we are to achieve the flagship ambition of the Sustainable Development Goals, to end extreme poverty by 2030, improved digital cooperation will need to play a vital role.

organizations.name: United Nations
